content: Is there any desire to go through and fix most of the clippy lints (at least ones that don't require refactoring other parts of the codebase or change behavior)? noticed there's quite a few when I opened up the project today, so I wouldn't mind going through and tidying it up :D (the vast majority are auto-fixable it seems)
I have a PR up for some performance related ones (rust-analyzer#6104)
As for others go for it. @matklad is fairly opinionated on clippy lints so will give you good feedback
@Wesley Norris I've documented our Clippy policy at https://github.com/rust-analyzer/rust-analyzer/pull/6118
